short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension changes the default search to blpsearch.com and offers search for movie information straight from your address bar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search4Moviex chrome browser extension by Aztec, set your default search provider to blpsearch.com and enables you to search for information about your favourite movies: release date, cast, director, trailers -  by going to the address bar and then typing 'F' and pressing the TAB key on your keyboard, enter your query and get the results you are looking for whether its an actor or a movie.
Please read carefully: By clicking the “ADD TO CHROME” button in the top right hand corner and installing the Search4Moviex, you agree to install this extension, and you agree to the End User License Agreement and the Privacy Policy and to receiving any future updates and upgrades. 
You can uninstall the extension at any time from the chrome extensions page or from the extensions bar on the top right of your browser

Terms:
https://www.blpsearch.com/terms
Privacy Policy:
https://www.blpsearch.com/privacy
